meanings.definition: A female graduate or former student of a school, college, or university.
meanings.sent1: The alumna proudly displayed her diploma on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The alumna attended the reunion to meet her old classmates.
meanings.sent3: The alumna joked that she still had nightmares about final exams.
meanings.sent4: She was the shining alumna of the graduating class, always excelling in her studies.
meanings.sent5: The alumna's success story inspired many other students to pursue higher education.

meanings.definition: A woman who has been a member of a particular group or organization.
meanings.sent1: The alumna volunteered at the charity event to give back to her community.
meanings.sent2: She was proud to be an alumna of the local book club.
meanings.sent3: The alumna shared funny stories from her time as a member of the hiking club.
meanings.sent4: As an alumna of the debate team, she always had a strong argument.
meanings.sent5: The alumna's dedication to the organization was truly admirable.
